## My Shiny Applicatoin
3 navigation tabs at the top:
  Analysis<br />
  Appendix<br />
  My github link<br />

## Sidebar choices
You can choose x and/or y axis given the variables in mtcars data frame<br />
If checkbox is selected, you will see a fitted line<br />

## Plotly interactive plot
In main panel, choose "PLOT"<br />
The scatter plot is interactive, you can select single or a group of data points<br />


## Regression Summary
In main panel, choose "REGRESSION"<br />
The lm mode given chosen x and y is summarized
